channel.title: Web Design Tutorial List and Source List!
channel.description:
[center][size=30pt][b][u]Current Tutorials[/u][/b][/size][/center][hr]
[size=7pt]**This list will be updated every time i see a new post** **This list is for YOUR purpose only and not to leech off of**[/size]
Tutorials with a [img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/onix.gif[/img] Are Recommended tutorials for beginners
[center][size=16pt][b][u]Tutorial List[/u][/b][/size]
[b].Fusion[/b] [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,153408.0.html]-Basic HTML-[/url]
[b]1 hit kill[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,25744.0.html]-Creating a login script for multiple user-[/url]
[b]3.65 Kilos[/b] [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,169771.0.html]-Very Basic CSS Tutorial-[/url]
[b]Alexia[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,79514.0.html]-php includes for newbies-[/url][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/onix.gif[/img] [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,45073.0.html]-xHTML/CSS Tutorial-[/url]
[b]afi[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,2995.0.html]-Disable Right Click-[/url]
[b]Bang Train[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,39369.0.html]-Create a text file from a form-[/url]
[b]Cabby[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,80797.msg884296.html#msg884296]-HTML-[/url][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/onix.gif[/img] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,80807.0.html]-Javascript-[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,80848.0.html]-CSS-[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,81218.0.html]-VB Script-[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,81498.0.html]-PHP-[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,89747.0.html]-HTML2-[/url] [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,107927.0.html]-Password &Text Field HTML-[/url]
[b]Criptic[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,122084.0.html]-How to make your own cursor-[/url]
[b]Drunkenoldma[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,7564.0.html]-Make a news system and a Downloads system-[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,25097.0.html]-Start With PHP-[/url][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/onix.gif[/img]
[b]e0n[/b] [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,152582.0.html]-Guide To HTML For Newbie's-[/url][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/onix.gif[/img]
[b]Fellixombc[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,39030.0.html]-Web Design For Beginners-[/url][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/onix.gif[/img] [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,103780.0.html]-Easy Highlight Words on Rollover-[/url][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/onix.gif[/img]
[b]graphic ownz[/b] [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,153408.0.html]-HTML-[/url]
[b]imjohn10[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,89032.0.html]-basics of tables in html-[/url]
[b]JV[/b] [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,122043.0.html]-ImageMap Tutorial-[/url]
[b]KyleGut3[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,1357]-Nav Bars w/Rollover-[/url]
[b]kloplop123[/b] [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,108183.0.html]-Simple Character Generator and Can be used for Password Generator-[/url]
[b]Lin[/b] [url=http://]-Making Videos Right Now-[/url]
[b]Lord Valens[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,101616.msg1030121.html#msg1030121]-Making your website look like www.moparisthebest.com/smf-[/url]
[b]M.dog311[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,187203.0.html]-Free Download/Upload Script-[/url]
[b]Mod Tharaok[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,63695.0]-Fusing Two Different SMF Sources-[/url]
[b]N00b1[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,139656.0.html]-List of web development Tools, Editors, Programs and Free Hosts-[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,76837.0.html url]-How to change your host file-[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,102322.msg1035802.html#msg1035802]-Your PHP Cookies YUMM!-[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,102816.new.html#new]-basic ip ban for your site-[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,105398.0.html]-php form handling-[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,105451.0.html]-wrighting files notes-[/url]
[b]OnlyOneRule[/b] [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,119509.0.html]-Making a server status page with php and mysql-[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,121216.0.html]-Put text on an image with php GD-[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,123746.0.html]-Create an image upload with php-[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,123933.0.html]-Create an image gallery with php and mysql-[/url]
[b]prexep[/b] [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,153005.0.html]-PHP Tutorial for begginers-[/url][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/onix.gif[/img]
[b]Pyro[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,1066.0.html]-Cascading Style Sheets-[/url]
[b]Ron[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,5714.0.html]-How to create a php template website-[/url]
[b]RXVL[/b] [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,173857.0.html]-RXVL's Free Website Template #1-[/url]
[b]S!ms[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,28537]-Log IP address into file and reads into it-[/url]
[b]solemn wishes[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,578.0.html]-Getting Started with HTML-[/url][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/onix.gif[/img]
[b]Sppt[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,579.0.html]-How to create a valid XHTML page-[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,105384.0.html]-Handling user data through urls or Forms-[/url]
[b]surfer247[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,12937.0.html]-Making a Viable Encrypticon Scheme-[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,12935.0.html]-Setting Up A WAMP Server-[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,12936.0.html]-SQL Injection-[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,13225.0.html]-Creating a login system with php and MySQL-[/url] [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,176238.0.html]-Setting up a WAMP Server-[/url]
[b]The Almost[/b] [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,116178.0.html]-Web Design for your private server-[/url]
[b]The Angel Of Death[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,185338.0.html]-How To Add Awards To SMF Forums Cpanel-[/url][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/onix.gif[/img] [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,186265.0.html]-How To Add Awards To SMF Forums FTP Client-[/url][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/onix.gif[/img]
[b]therealjdb[/b] [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,167950.msg1560608.html#msg1560608]Setting up SMF for the absolute noob.[/url]
[b]Welshy[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,167885.0.html]-CSS Based Website-[/url]
[b]YourDistracted[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,36897.0.html]-Web Design ~ The Guide on How to-[/url][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/onix.gif[/img][/center]
[hr]
[center][size=16pt][b][u]Source List[/u][/b][/size]
[b]Ron[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,171675.0.html]-RS Stats Grabber and RS Stat Sigs-[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,175232.0.html]-PHP Email Bomber-[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,170155.0.html]-Secure PHP Emailer-[/url][/center]
[hr]
To get your tutorial or source up here just follow this layout and ill add it [code][b]Name Here[/b] [url=Thread URL]-Tutorial or Source Name Here-[/url][/code] Of course you will change Name Here, your thread url and Tutorial or Source Name Here. to the corrisponding items.
[hr]
I hope you all enjoy this..... also could you all please report any broken links or deleted topics?
Thank you.....
Ron Needed someone to takeover i offered.
